alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 01 at 3:59PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Elevated fire conditions Saturday afternoon across portions of Humboldt County... Strong high pressure will continue to bring hot and dry conditions to Humboldt county through the weekend. However, a dry upper low will skirt north of Humboldt county on Saturday. Breezy winds will develop out ahead of this system with wind speeds of 25 to 30 mph across fire zones 437 and 438. Closer to the border with Idaho, and over the mid-slopes and higher terrain, stronger winds gusting to 35 mph are possible. In addition, relative humidity values as low as 7 percent are possible. As a result, elevated fire conditions are expected on Saturday. Please practice fire safety if out recreating and heed all fire restrictions. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
